name: supercorporation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very large company or group of companies that is controlled together as a single organization: A few hundred supercorporations control the most important areas of the economy. The financial crisis was partly the result of banks making bad loans to super-corporations.
More examplesFewer examplesSupercorporations contribute huge amounts of money to political campaigns.Supercorporations are able to influence both governent and society as a whole.We believe that in the future, supercorporations will be controlled by computers, not by managers.They track down the results of an experiment that has been stolen from a super-corporation.
